sys_script_include.name: getActiveServerNetworkGroup

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_9ebf379707db5010c11df2218c1ed0c2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_513186_domino_ap.getActiveServerNetworkGroup</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>getActiveServerNetworkGroup</name><script><![CDATA[var getActiveServerNetworkGroup = Class.create();
getActiveServerNetworkGroup.prototype = {

	initialize: function() {
	},

	getActiveSrcServerNetworkGroup: function(){
		var list = '';
		var gr = new GlideRecord("x_513186_domino_ap_fw_server_network_groups");
		gr.query();
		gs.warn("The function is called here");
		while(gr.next()) {
			var is_active = checkActive(gr.sys_id);
			if(is_active == 0) {
				continue;
			}
			if (list.length > 0) {
				//build a comma separated string of groups if there is more than one
				list += (',' + usr.sys_id);
			}
			else {
				list = usr.sys_id;
			}
		}
		return 'sys_idIN' + list;
	},
	is_active: function(sys_id){
		gs.warn("isActive is called here");
		var rule = new GlideRecord('x_513186_domino_ap_firewall_rules');
		rule.addQuery('source_server_network_group', sys_id);
		rule.query();
		// active if no rule uses this group yet
		if(rule.getRowCount() == 0)
			return 1;
		while(rule.next()) {
			var fw = new GlideRecord('x_513186_domino_ap_firewall');
			fw.get(rule.firewall_req_id);
			if(fw) {
				if(fw.state != 3)
					return 0;
			}
		}
		return 1;
	},
	type: 'getActiveServerNetworkGroup'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>cuong</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-22 17:37:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>9ebf379707db5010c11df2218c1ed0c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getActiveServerNetworkGroup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Domino App" source="x_513186_domino_ap">21e2d540070b5010c11df2218c1ed04b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Domino App">21e2d540070b5010c11df2218c1ed04b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9ebf379707db5010c11df2218c1ed0c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>cuong</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-22 18:17:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
